storyInfo: Viviana walks on an endless spiral staircase, glimpsing different possibilities of fate.

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Don't just stand there, come inside.
Let me show you around my room.
What do you think?
You decorated it yourself?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Leonie helped.
It's so spacious, and bright. Vivian... Your room is lovely.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Danke!
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: This room gets more sunlight than any other in the entire spire. As shy and lazy as Sturmland's sun is, it never feels too dark in here, even on the cloudiest days.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: And then there's the veranda! It runs along the entire wall of the room. Look at that view... how far you can see... Look there.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: At what?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The green roof over there.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: It's the Glenlossie Botanical Garden. Mutti took me there a few times. It has so many plants we don't see in Sturmland, or even greater Leithanien. But I love its roof the most.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Some Bolívarian claw-vines worked their way up there. It's probably too tall to easily get up onto the roof to trim them, so the staff just let them grow, and now they've covered the entire thing!
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: In springtime, clusters of pink flowers bloom from the vines, and the roof looks like a pink cloud. And now, in summertime, it's a deep green...
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: The leaves of those vines never drop. By autumn, the roof will turn gold, and in winter, only a perfect sheet of white will remain.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Ja, I can picture it now. Beautiful.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No matter how busy Vati was with his government work, he would always take time out of his day to come visit. Mutti would paint the scenery while he quietly told me their stories.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Vivian...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Can you share those stories with me? Of Mutti and Vati?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: That day in Marigold Alley, when he waited for her?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: (Nod)
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Vati said he was determined to say goodbye to her. But once he saw her, he couldn't bring himself to turn and go...
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: 'Vivian, if two hands are destined to join, why let the lands come between them?!' Ugh, so cheesy! Anyway, Vati brought Mutti back to Sturmland.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: He stood... right there, beneath the spire, telling the worthies and bigwigs that if they didn't show Mutti the proper respect, he'd never return to Hochberg Spire again!
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Nor would he succeed the Kurfürst.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: And did the nobles accede?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: They did.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: All because Vati stood below the spire for three whole days... Many men came to either change his mind or just shout at him, but none succeeded. They had no choice but to give in.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Werner von Hochberg protected his love, like a hero from a storybook.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: They were married with the blessings of everyone around them.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Viviana von Hochberg, your birth, too, won the blessings of all.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Wunderbar.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Oh? What was that?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Is that Leonie? The door's open.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: A maid walks in. Viviana looks to hide, but the maid goes straight for the little girl, as if she doesn't see Viviana at all.
Leonie, are you here for the carpet?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: *sigh*, Fräulein Droste, please step aside.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: It's a masterpiece by a Minoan craftsman. Very comfortable under my feet, and the image of the lake and white walls on it is so vivid, I can almost feel the wind blowing when I look at it.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Mutti loved this carpet. She worked long and hard, scribing so many poems for others, just to be able to buy it.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: When she left Zwillingstürme, she didn't bring much luggage with her, but she did bring this carpet.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: So... it would sell for a bit of money.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: You have to understand the Dame. This spire is otherwise empty; your room is the last decent thing in the place. If she could help it, the Dame wouldn't touch a thing in here.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: But since Kurfürst Werner's death, she has been troubled by all sorts of people. She's sold everything that could be sold...
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: You're due to go study in Columbia, which takes no small amount of coin. She hopes you won't have to live in poverty abroad.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: Oh, but, I could always not go.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: That won't do, Fräulein. You ought to leave Sturmland, to leave Leithanien.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: The Dame said as much to the Kurfürst two years ago, but it was only recently he gave the nod. You ought to set out soon, lest he change his mind.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: What about Mutti? Can't she come with me?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: The Dame is at the Kurfürst's beck and call. She must remain in the spire.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: I... I should speak to Onkel Schild.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Fräulein, he may be your paternal uncle, but he is now Kurfürst of Sturmland.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: Just two years after the late Kurfürst Werner took the seat, he was assassinated while touring the domain. His marriage to the Dame offended a lot of people, and some have speculated it was Schild himself...
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: Ugh, what am I thinking, why would I even tell you this?
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: Leonie... I have a question, and I'm not sure who to ask.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: If... if Mutti and Vati had lived an ordinary life, a commoner's life, would we have been happy?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Fräulein... You've always been the sort of girl who... sees things as they are. You know what's going on.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: Pack your things. Put your beloved books and art collections into that rattan box there. I'll take care of the carpet and come back to put the rest in order.
attributes.name: Leonie

attributes.content: The Elafia girl looks out at the city below the veranda. The wind is her only company now.
They say the roof of the Glenlossie Botanical Garden is beautiful. But what's there to appreciate when the night shrouds all?
Frau Giallo?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It seems I really can't hear the voices anymore.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: No obvious wounds on you. Could your hearing be impaired?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: No. It's just much quieter than I'm used to...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Even as you're standing right in front of me, I still feel... so distant from you.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh? Is this a little better?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Maybe I should speak louder?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: No, that's not it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Let me take you somewhere nearby to rest. The ones chasing you should be far away by now.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Come, I'll help carry the cello.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Why are you gripping it so tightly? Your fingers are turning white!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It must be very important to you.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It is my eyes, my ears, my voice, and my heart.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I'm ashamed to admit it, but there was a time when I was even afraid of it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It took me some time to learn how to get along with it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Soror? Why are you sitting in a dark corner with the lights out? Amita Luciana doesn't know you've come back.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why did you skip cello practice after rowing in the park?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I seem to have kicked your cello. The instrument is expensive. If I've damaged it... I have the money to compensate you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Fede, take it away for me, will you?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Hide it anywhere you like. The study, the attic, in storage... You can even throw it away...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Are you crying?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You played another piece you hadn't mastered yet.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't know... As soon as I draw my bow across its strings, I hear voices. So many voices.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: They're real voices, trapped in the bodies of men and women. They want to come out, and I should help them.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But they're too loud, too chaotic.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: So many crying voices, laughing voices, whispering voices, voices furiously complaining... They all surge together...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: They're so loud, Fede! I can hardly breathe...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Are you unwell? Should I get Amita Luciana?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I just... I just need some quiet...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The room is quiet, except for the isolated sobbing in the corner.
Two black halos look at each other, their cold, faint light being the only words they share.

attributes.text: Just be quiet for a while, just so my head doesn't hurt so much, just for a bit.
I will get used to the voices.
I just haven't mastered the skill yet...
It didn't take me long to learn to row a boat today. All I had to do was row it through the thick fog to the island in the center of the lake.
A song comes from the far shore.

attributes.content: Are you singing?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It's a folk song popular with buskers on this street. Heh, it's got a nice sound to it, but I'm a little tone-deaf, so...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: When Jan would come home after being bullied, I'd comfort him with this song.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You mentioned 'this street' just now?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh, ja, Karl Schmidt Street. The people of Zwillingstürme also call it Marigold Alley.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Seniora Schüler, you haven't answered my question.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: According to the records of the Zwillingstürme Gendarmerie, Freiherr Fynn engaged in combat with a suspect to stop a kidnapping on Karl Schmidt Street in the autumn of 1085.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Baron was injured and unconscious for a period. When he awoke, both the suspect and the abducted Caprinae woman, twenty-seven-year-old Yulia Schüler, were missing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Loris Bordin took over the case and conducted a series of investigations, finding no promising leads.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He found the Baron's testimony suspicious, with the only certainty being that the Baron was the last person to see you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He strongly believed that a secret laid hidden within. Something like the Witch King's later experiments on Infected civilians, and that you had become the target of the Baron.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But under pressure from above, the Gendarmerie halted any subsequent investigation and closed the case as an 'accidental disappearance.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Loris Bordin took the case file back to his residence, and over the course of fifteen years, it has grown increasingly thick.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He never gave up on investigating the truth, and never gave up on looking for you. Despite several clues indicating that Yulia Schüler was already deceased.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: You have just informed me that this here is Karl Schmidt Street.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: In other words, you came to the Genesis Horn posthumously, and currently exist as a form of 'consciousness.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: In your cognition, you have never left the scene of the incident.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So please tell me, what exactly happened in the course of that incident?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This is indeed Marigold Alley. We're standing in front of the piano studio at the intersection.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Oh, Herr Executor, we've wasted so much time. I really have to place these Arts devices in their proper places, quickly!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Those masked men will be coming soon.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Do you mean to say that the Witch King's remains appear at various locations in Kargereich, according to some knowable set of rules?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Ah, are they the Witch King's remains?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: No, they're not the ones in reality, sowing chaos in the name of the Witch King. What you see are but manifestations of the Witch King's craft, the 'Echoes of Herkunftshorn' in a truer sense.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...Klängenfolgen, to follow the sounds. That's the way to see the Witch King.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Why would the Witch King be in Zwillingstürme?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Although I suppose it makes sense. I'm already dead, and the Witch King is too. So we're in the same place, that's logical enough.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It would also explain all these strange happenings...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Perhaps, having lost the sound of music, I can no longer perceive what you see in your eyes. Why do you call this place 'Zwillingstürme'?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...Are you blind too?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Frau Giallo, do you see the Musikinstrumententürme?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The what?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Arturia looks in the direction the Caprinae woman is pointing, and sees nothing but vague light and shadow.
Reichsmusikhochschule has towers, die Musikinstrumententürme. But only eleven.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Reichsmusikhochschule is the most famous landmark in Bachshof. Each spire of the royal academy is inspired by a musical instrument, and was named for it upon completion.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: There are eleven instruments, and when Herr Bach presided over his 'Glorreiches Kapitalprojekt,' a grand urban plan, he added eleven more.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Twenty-two instrument spires corresponding to the twenty-two districts of Zwillingstürme, like a perfect symphony orchestra.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Hah, you know your stuff.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Ja, but there are only eleven Musikinstrumententürme here. This is not the Reichsmusikhochschule of Zwillingstürme, but that of the Witch King's time.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And behind us... is a tilted spire, circular, the color of jade.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: 'Der Schiefer Turm der Ewigkeit.' The Leaning Tower of Eternity?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It was originally the spire of some Kurfürst or other. It began to lean due to changes in the strata, and with the support of the magnificent Arts of the spire casters, it maintained its baffling tilt without collapsing.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: This miracle of Leithanian architecture was destroyed in a Catastrophe, four centuries ago...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Not only that. I see Der Wiener Uhrturm, Das auf den Kopf gestellte Strafgebäude, Die Tür des Wissens, Der Schönbrunnturm...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Countless spires of different eras, forms, and functions. I've only read about them in books, or heard of them in stories from my elders...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: But here, they all stand.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: This isn't Zwillingstürme, but it's not Vedunien either. I think the most proper name for it would be... 'Leithanien.'
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The only part that feels familiar is the Marigold Alley beneath my feet. At the intersection sits a piano studio, at the end of the street is an art gallery, and right in the middle is my cafe.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I'm glad they're still here. I've rediscovered them.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Here, I can still live just the way I used to. So, unfamiliar as this place is, I would still rather call it Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Maybe you haven't rediscovered your old life.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Rather, it's because of your life that you came to be here.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: There are only nine Musikinstrumententürme left... When did the Klavierturm and the Waldhornturm vanish?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: (Herr Fremont was right, the Genesis Horn is accelerating its collapse...)
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Frau Giallo, do you... see it now?
attributes.name: Yulia
